name: A Witch in Time
description:
If you had the chance to change your fate, would you?

The graduates of West Bridgeton High School have laid out their plans for the fall. Some have big dreams, some have regrets. They all come together for one last night before they head out on their separate paths. But a local folk tale sets two best friends off on a quest that could change the future they face… and the past they came from.

Sabrina Boyd-Surka............................... Story, Design, Art
Matt Boyd-Surka.................................... Programming, Art

Music by Kongano, Ross Bugden, and Tim Reichert.
